publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4500 Dr Elaine Murray: Moffat Mountain Rescue: Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service—That the Parliament congratulates Moffat Mountain Rescue Team on its success in achieving a Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service this year, in recognition of its many years of work dealing with mountaineering emergencies, and commends the team for its dedication, commitment and bravery.
S2M-4500 Moffat Mountain Rescue: Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service (lodged on 5 June 2006) Derek Brownlee*, Michael Matheson*

S2M-4500 Dr Elaine Murray: Moffat Mountain Rescue: Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service—That the Parliament congratulates Moffat Mountain Rescue Team on its success in achieving a Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service this year, in recognition of its many years of work dealing with mountaineering emergencies, and commends the team for its dedication, commitment and bravery. Supported by: Derek Brownlee, Michael Matheson
S2M-4500 Moffat Mountain Rescue: Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service (lodged on 5 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4500 Moffat Mountain Rescue: Queen’s Award for Voluntary Service (lodged on 5 June 2006) John Swinburne*
